basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Python Developer
basics.summary: Motivated developer with 3 years of experience, including hands-on production work with Python, Flask, Docker, and TensorFlow. Experienced in building and maintaining backend services, REST APIs, and ML pipelines. Eager to leverage strong problem-solving skills and a passion for learning in a challenging Python-focused role, with a strong interest in mastering FastAPI.

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Developed and maintained Python-based ML systems and backend services, contributing to end-to-end product delivery in an agile environment.
highlights: Developed and maintained a Linux-based ML training infrastructure using Python, Flask for REST APIs, and TensorBoard for monitoring.
Engineered the backend for 'AdCognition', an ML ad detection system, utilizing Python and TensorFlow for the model training pipeline.
Built 'RoboGPT', a Python-based system integrating NVIDIA Isaac Sim with OpenAI APIs to enable natural language control of robotic simulations.
Containerized and supported deployment workflows for Python services.
Performed code reviews and mentored junior developers, fostering team growth and code quality.

projects.name: MARS5 TTS Telegram Bot
projects.description: A production Telegram bot for voice cloning using Python, the CambAI MARS5 API, and Docker for deployment.
highlights: Developed a Python backend to handle external API integration with CambAI MARS5.
Implemented the bot using the Telegram Bot API framework.
Packaged and deployed the application using Docker.
